languages.text: Whenever an ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} that would make them fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, the psyker immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. During that turn, the psyker can only use Prophetic Intervention. This power can only be used under these conditions. Prophetic Intervention restores the ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to the amount they had before the attack that triggered the intervention. However, the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1 until the end of combat. ! This power can only be used by psykers with a psy rating of 3 or higher.
languages.original_text: Когда союзник получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, заставляющий его упасть {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}, псайкер немедленно получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, во время которого может использовать только Пророческое вмешательство. В иных случаях эта сила недоступна. Пророческое вмешательство восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} цели до уровня, который предшествовал атаке, спровоцировавшей вмешательство. После этого {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} псайкера понижается на 1 до конца боя. ! Может использоваться только псайкерами, чей пси-рейтинг выше или равен 3.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an ally suffers damage that would make them fall unconscious, the Psyker immediately gains an extra turn. During that turn, the Psyker can only use Prophetic Intervention, and it is the only condition allowing to use this power. Prophetic Intervention restores the ally's wounds to the amount they had before the attack that triggered the intervention. However, the Psyker's psy rating reduces by −1 until the end of combat. ! This power can only be used by psykers with psy rating 4 or higher.

Whenever an ally suffers damage that would make them fall unconscious, the psyker immediately gains an extra turn. During that turn, the psyker can only use Prophetic Intervention. This power can only be used under these conditions. Prophetic Intervention restores the ally's wounds to the amount they had before the attack that triggered the intervention. However, the psyker's psy rating is reduced by −1 until the end of combat. ! This power can only be used by psykers with a psy rating of 4 or higher.

Whenever an ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} that would make them fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, the psyker immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. During that turn, the psyker can only use Prophetic Intervention. This power can only be used under these conditions. Prophetic Intervention restores the ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to the amount they had before the attack that triggered the intervention. However, the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1 until the end of combat. ! This power can only be used by psykers with a psy rating of 3 or higher.

Whenever an ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} that would make them fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, the psyker immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. During that {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the psyker can only use Prophetic Intervention. This power can only be used under these conditions. Prophetic Intervention restores the ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to the amount they had before the attack that triggered the intervention. However, the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1 until the end of combat. ! This power can only be used by psykers with a psy rating of 3 or higher.

Whenever an ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} that would make them fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, the psyker immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. During that turn, the psyker can only use Prophetic Intervention. This power can only be used under these conditions. Prophetic Intervention restores the ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to the amount they had before the attack that triggered the intervention. However, the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1 until the end of combat. ! This power can only be used by psykers with a psy rating of 3 or higher.

languages.text: 每当灵能者的盟友受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态时，灵能者立刻获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}。在这个额外回合中，灵能者只能使用先知干预这一能力。此能力只能在这样的前提条件下使用。 先知干预可以将盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}恢复至遭到攻击之前的程度。然而，灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}会降低1级，效果持续至战斗结束。 ！只有灵能等级不低于3级的灵能者才能使用此能力。
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} that would make them fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, the psyker immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. During that turn, the psyker can only use Prophetic Intervention. This power can only be used under these conditions. Prophetic Intervention restores the ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to the amount they had before the attack that triggered the intervention. However, the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1 until the end of combat. ! This power can only be used by psykers with a psy rating of 3 or higher.

traits.locale_text: 每当灵能者的盟友受到伤害，陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态时，灵能者立刻获得一个额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。在这个额外回合中，灵能者只能使用先知干预这一能力。此能力只能在这样的前提条件下使用。 先知干预可以将盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}恢复至遭到攻击之前的程度。然而，灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}会降低1级，效果持续至战斗结束。 ！只有灵能等级不低于4级的灵能者才能使用此能力。

每当灵能者的盟友受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态时，灵能者立刻获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}。在这个额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中，灵能者只能使用先知干预这一能力。此能力只能在这样的前提条件下使用。 先知干预可以将盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}恢复至遭到攻击之前的程度。然而，灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}会降低1级，效果持续至战斗结束。 ！只有灵能等级不低于3级的灵能者才能使用此能力。

每当灵能者的盟友受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态时，灵能者立刻获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}。在这个额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中，灵能者只能使用先知干预这一能力。此能力只能在这样的前提条件下使用。 先知干预可以将盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}恢复至遭到攻击之前的程度。然而，灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}会降低1级，效果持续至战斗结束。 ！只有灵能等级不低于3级的灵能者才能使用此能力。

languages.text: Cada vez que un aliado sufra {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} capaz de dejarlo {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g}, el psíquico recibe inmediatamente un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g}. Durante ese turno, el psíquico solo puede usar Intervención profética. Este poder solo se puede utilizar en ese momento. Intervención profética restaura las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} del aliado a la cantidad que tenía antes del ataque que activa la intervención. A cambio, el {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del psíquico se reduce en −1 hasta el final del combate. ! Solo los psíquicos con factor psíquico de 3 o superior pueden usar este poder.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} that would make them fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, the psyker immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. During that turn, the psyker can only use Prophetic Intervention. This power can only be used under these conditions. Prophetic Intervention restores the ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to the amount they had before the attack that triggered the intervention. However, the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1 until the end of combat. ! This power can only be used by psykers with a psy rating of 3 or higher.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que un aliado sufra daño capaz de dejarlo {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g}, el psíquico recibe inmediatamente un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} adicional. Durante ese turno, el psíquico solo puede usar Intervención profética. Este poder solo se puede utilizar en ese momento. Intervención profética restaura las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} del aliado a la cantidad que tenía antes del ataque que activa la intervención. A cambio, el {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del psíquico se reduce en −1 hasta el final del combate. ! Solo los psíquicos con factor psíquico de 4 o superior pueden usar este poder.

Cada vez que un aliado sufra {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} capaz de dejarlo {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g}, el psíquico recibe inmediatamente un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno adicional{/g}. Durante ese {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el psíquico solo puede usar Intervención profética. Este poder solo se puede utilizar en ese momento. Intervención profética restaura las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} del aliado a la cantidad que tenía antes del ataque que activa la intervención. A cambio, el {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del psíquico se reduce en −1 hasta el final del combate. ! Solo los psíquicos con factor psíquico de 3 o superior pueden usar este poder.

languages.text: 仲間が{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}になる量の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けると、異能者は即座に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を獲得する。このターン中、異能者は予言の干渉しか使えない。この能力は次の条件下でのみ発動する。 予言の干渉は仲間の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を、干渉が発生する直前の値まで回復する。ただし、異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}は戦闘終了まで−1減少する。 ！この能力は超能力レート3以上の異能者のみ使用できる。
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} that would make them fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, the psyker immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. During that turn, the psyker can only use Prophetic Intervention. This power can only be used under these conditions. Prophetic Intervention restores the ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to the amount they had before the attack that triggered the intervention. However, the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1 until the end of combat. ! This power can only be used by psykers with a psy rating of 3 or higher.

仲間が{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}になる量の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けると、異能者は即座に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}次のターン{/g}に入る。この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}、異能者は予言の干渉しか使えない。この能力は次の条件下でのみ発動する。 予言の干渉は仲間の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を、干渉が発生する直前の値まで回復する。ただし、異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}は戦闘終了まで−1減少する。 !この能力は超能力レート3以上の異能者のみ使用できる。

仲間が{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}になる量の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けると、異能者は即座に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}次のターン{/g}に入る。この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}、異能者は予言の干渉しか使えない。この能力は次の条件下でのみ発動する。 予言の干渉は仲間の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を、干渉が発生する直前の値まで回復する。ただし、異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}は戦闘終了まで−1減少する。 !この能力は超能力レート3以上の異能者のみ使用できる。

languages.text: Когда союзник получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, заставляющий его упасть {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}, псайкер немедленно получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, во время которого может использовать только Пророческое вмешательство. В иных случаях эта сила недоступна. Пророческое вмешательство восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} цели до уровня, который предшествовал атаке, спровоцировавшей вмешательство. После этого {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} псайкера понижается на 1 до конца боя. ! Может использоваться только псайкерами, чей пси-рейтинг выше или равен 3.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} that would make them fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, the psyker immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. During that turn, the psyker can only use Prophetic Intervention. This power can only be used under these conditions. Prophetic Intervention restores the ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to the amount they had before the attack that triggered the intervention. However, the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1 until the end of combat. ! This power can only be used by psykers with a psy rating of 3 or higher.

traits.locale_text: Когда союзник получает урон, заставляющий его упасть {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}, псайкер немедленно получает дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, во время которого может использовать только Пророческое вмешательство. В иных случаях эта сила недоступна. Пророческое вмешательство восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} цели до уровня, который предшествовал атаке, спровоцировавшей вмешательство. После этого {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} псайкера понижается на 1 до конца боя. ! Может использоваться только псайкерами, чей пси-рейтинг выше или равен 4.

Когда союзник получает урон, заставляющий его упасть {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}, псайкер немедленно получает дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, во время которого может использовать только Пророческое вмешательство. В иных случаях эта сила недоступна. Пророческое вмешательство восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} цели до уровня, который предшествовал атаке, спровоцировавшей вмешательство. После этого {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} псайкера понижается на 1 до конца боя. ! Может использоваться только псайкерами, чей пси-рейтинг выше или равен 4.

Когда союзник получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, заставляющий его упасть {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}, псайкер немедленно получает дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, во время которого может использовать только Пророческое вмешательство. В иных случаях эта сила недоступна. Пророческое вмешательство восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} цели до уровня, который предшествовал атаке, спровоцировавшей вмешательство. После этого {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} псайкера понижается на 1 до конца боя. ! Может использоваться только псайкерами, чей пси-рейтинг выше или равен 3.

languages.text: Wann immer ein Verbündete {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleidet, der ihn {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}bewusstlos{/g} machen würde, erlangt der Psioniker augenblicklich einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}zusätzlichen Zug{/g}. Während dieses Zuges kann er nur Prophetische Intervention einsetzen. Diese Kraft kann nur unter diesen Bedingungen eingesetzt werden. Prophetische Intervention stellt die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Verbündeten wieder auf die Anzahl zurück, die sie vor dem Angriff hatten, der die Intervention auslöste. Der {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} des Psionikers wird allerdings bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −1 reduziert ! Diese Kraft kann nur von Psionikern mit einem Psi-Wert von 3 oder höher genutzt werden.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} that would make them fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, the psyker immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. During that turn, the psyker can only use Prophetic Intervention. This power can only be used under these conditions. Prophetic Intervention restores the ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to the amount they had before the attack that triggered the intervention. However, the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1 until the end of combat. ! This power can only be used by psykers with a psy rating of 3 or higher.

traits.locale_text: Wann immer ein Verbündete Schaden erleidet, der ihn {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}bewusstlos{/g} machen würde, erlangt der Psioniker augenblicklich einen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. Während dieses Zuges kann er nur Prophetische Intervention einsetzen. Diese Kraft kann nur unter diesen Bedingungen eingesetzt werden. Prophetische Intervention stellt die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Verbündeten wieder auf die Anzahl zurück, die sie vor dem Angriff hatten, der die Intervention auslöste. Der {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} des Psionikers wird allerdings bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −1 reduziert ! Diese Kraft kann nur von Psionikern mit einem Psi-Wert von 4 oder höher genutzt werden.

Wann immer ein Verbündete {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleidet, der ihn {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}bewusstlos{/g} machen würde, erlangt der Psioniker augenblicklich einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}zusätzlichen Zug{/g}. Während dieses {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} kann er nur Prophetische Intervention einsetzen. Diese Kraft kann nur unter diesen Bedingungen eingesetzt werden. Prophetische Intervention stellt die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Verbündeten wieder auf die Anzahl zurück, die sie vor dem Angriff hatten, der die Intervention auslöste. Der {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} des Psionikers wird allerdings bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −1 reduziert ! Diese Kraft kann nur von Psionikern mit einem Psi-Wert von 3 oder höher genutzt werden.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un allié subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} susceptibles de lui faire {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}perdre connaissance{/g}, le psyker bénéficie immédiatement d'un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g}. Pendant ce tour, le psyker peut uniquement utiliser Intervention prophétique. Ces conditions sont les seules dans lesquelles ce pouvoir est utilisable. Intervention prophétique rétablit la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de l'allié au niveau d'avant l'attaque qui a déclenché l'intervention. En revanche, l'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} du psyker est réduit de −1 jusqu'à la fin du combat. ! Ce pouvoir est réservé aux psykers dont l'indice psy est supérieur ou égal à 3.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} that would make them fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, the psyker immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. During that turn, the psyker can only use Prophetic Intervention. This power can only be used under these conditions. Prophetic Intervention restores the ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to the amount they had before the attack that triggered the intervention. However, the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1 until the end of combat. ! This power can only be used by psykers with a psy rating of 3 or higher.

En revanche, l'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} du psyker est réduit de −1 jusqu'à la fin du combat. ! Ce pouvoir est réservé aux psykers dont l'indice psy est supérieur ou égal à 3.

languages.text: Bir dost birim ne zaman ona {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}baygınlık{/g} geçirtecek bir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} maruz kalsa ruhsezer anında bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazanır. Ruhsezer, bu turda yalnızca Kehanet Müdahalesi kullanabilir. Bu güç yalnızca bu koşullarda kullanılabilir. Kehanet Müdahalesi, dost birimin {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanlarını müdahaleyi tetikleyen saldırıdan önceki hâline getirir. Ancak ruhsezerin {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesi{/g} 1 puan düşer. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. ! Bu güç yalnızca ruhsezi derecesi 3 veya daha yüksek olan ruhsezerlerce kullanılabilir.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} that would make them fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, the psyker immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. During that turn, the psyker can only use Prophetic Intervention. This power can only be used under these conditions. Prophetic Intervention restores the ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to the amount they had before the attack that triggered the intervention. However, the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1 until the end of combat. ! This power can only be used by psykers with a psy rating of 3 or higher.
